name: The Second Player
description:
-------WebGL version has a couple screen scaling issues, so I recommend the win64 download-------

You are the second player to play this level. The first seems to have been quite proficient at the game and may have been a speedrunner, though perhaps not a very good one. Use the clues to deduct and perfectly replicate  Player One's completion of the level.

Controls:

esc        - try again

space   - attack

wasd    - move

E             - open door violently
